verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of David. <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me when I <S%H7121>call<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; Thou hast set me at <S%H7337>large<s%> when I was in <S%H6862>distress<s%>: Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H8085>me<s%>, and hear my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>.

O ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>, how <S%H5704>long<s%> shall my <S%H3519>glory<s%> be turned into <S%H3639>dishonor<s%>? How long will ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7385>vanity<s%>, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> after <S%H3577>falsehood<s%>? <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
But <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath set <S%H6395>apart<s%> for himself him that is <S%H2623>godly<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I call unto <S%H7121>him<s%>.
Stand in <S%H7264>awe<s%>, and <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H559>not<s%>: Commune with your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> upon your <S%H4904>bed<s%>, and be <S%H1826>still<s%>. <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
Offer <S%H2076><s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And put your <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> there are that <S%H559>say<s%>, Who will <S%H7200>show<s%> us any <S%H2896>good<s%>? <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, lift thou <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy countenance upon <S%H6440>us<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, More than they have <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H1715>grain<s%> and their new <S%H8492>wine<s%> are <S%H7231>increased<s%>.
In <S%H7965>peace<s%> will I <S%H3162>both<s%> lay me <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%>; For <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, <S%H910>alone<s%> makest me <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
